description.narrative: The Project Development Objectives are to improve equitable access to, and quality of, secondary education, and provide a response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall prepare and adopt a National School Infrastructure Strategy satisfactory to the Association by January 31,2021 (Section IV, A).

baseline.value: There is no operational community engagement linked to a grievance redress mechanism

target.value: 80 percent of grievances received in Year 3 of the project addressed within the timeframe specified in the grievance redressguidelines

actual.value: There is no operational community engagement linked to a grievance redress mechanism
